title: Notice to terminate tenancy
text: A tenancy at will or by sufferance may be terminated by the landlord by giving the tenant written notice at least thirty days prior to the termination date.

title: Security deposit limitations
text: A landlord may not demand or receive a security deposit in excess of two months' rent. The landlord shall return the security deposit, less any lawful deductions, within thirty days after termination of the tenancy.

title: Itemized statement for security deposit
text: If any portion of the security deposit is withheld, the landlord shall provide the tenant with an itemized list of damages and charges within thirty days.

title: Landlord right of entry
text: A landlord may enter the dwelling unit only at reasonable times and upon reasonable notice to the tenant, except in cases of emergency.

title: Termination for nonpayment of rent
text: If a tenant fails to pay rent when due, the landlord may terminate the tenancy in accordance with applicable notice requirements.
